pyzui.ferntileprovider module¶

Dynamic tile provider for Barnsley’s fern.

class pyzui.ferntileprovider.FernTileProvider(tilecache)[source]¶

Bases: DynamicTileProvider

FernTileProvider objects are used for generating tiles of Barnsley’s fern iterated function system.

Constructor: FernTileProvider(TileCache)

Create a new TileProvider for loading tiles into the given tilecache.

filext = 'png'¶
tilesize = 256¶
aspect_ratio = 1.0¶
max_iterations = 50000¶
max_points = 10000¶
transformations = [(0.01, (0.0, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0, 0.16, 0.0)), (0.07, (0.2, -0.26, 0.0, 0.23, 0.22, 1.6)), (0.07, (-0.15, 0.28, 0.0, 0.26, 0.24, 0.44)), (0.85, (0.85, 0.04, 0.0, -0.04, 0.85, 1.6))]¶
color = (100, 170, 0)¶
__choose_transformation()¶

Randomly choose a transformation based on the probability of each transformation being chosen.

__choose_transformation() -> tuple<float,float,float,float,float,float>

__transform(x, y)¶

Randomly choose a transformation and apply it to x and y, returning the result as a tuple.

__transform(float, float) -> tuple<float,float>

__draw_point(tile, x, y, tilesize_units)¶

Draw the given point on the given tile.

__draw_point(Image, float, float, float) -> None

Precondition: 0.0 <= x <= tilesize_units Precondition: 0.0 <= y <= tilesize_units

_load_dynamic(tile_id, outfile)[source]¶

Perform whatever actions necessary to load the tile identified by the given tile_id into the location given by outfile.

_load_dynamic(tuple<string,int,int,int>, string)
